data.approach: Investigate why bd list outputs DATABASE MISMATCH errors during IDE startup when fetching task counts for projects. The error occurs in getProjectTaskCounts which calls bd list --json. Need to: 1) Understand why the repo IDs mismatch, 2) Determine if this is a legitimate warning or a bug in repo ID detection, 3) Fix the root cause or add graceful handling.

summary: Fixed DATABASE MISMATCH errors in marduk and chimaro projects
Root cause: repo ID canonicalization changed in beads upgrade
Solution: Ran bd migrate --update-repo-id on both affected projects
findings: Both projects now work correctly with bd list --json
recommendedActions: Monitor for similar issues in other projects
Consider documenting this as a known migration step after beads upgrades

summary: Fixed DATABASE MISMATCH errors in marduk and chimaro projects

humanActions.action: Monitor for similar issues in other projects with .beads/ directories
humanActions.reason: Same issue may affect other projects that havent been accessed recently

patternsEstablished: When bd shows DATABASE MISMATCH DETECTED error, run bd migrate --update-repo-id to fix
gotchas: Beads upgrades may change URL canonicalization which invalidates stored repo IDs
